abort.reconfigure_successful:
**Re-configuration was successful**

Go to [webhooks in Twilio]({twilio_url}) and update the webhook with the following settings:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST
- Content Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) on how to configure automations to handle incoming data.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up a [webhook with Twilio]({twilio_url}).

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST
- Content Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) on how to configure automations to handle incoming data.

reconfigure.description: Do you want to start re-configuration?
reconfigure.title: Re-configure Twilio webhook
